# Autogenerated Resume
[![Typst's PDF](https://github.com/Mmesek/resume/actions/workflows/typst.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Mmesek/resume/actions/workflows/typst.yaml)

This repository contains [template](/templates) for my personal [resume](https://github.com/Mmesek/resume/blob/resume/resume.pdf) using [Typst](https://typst.app/) as a templating engine out of YAML configuration located in [configs](/configs) and [meta](/meta). 

Previously made using LaTeX with Python scripts generating initial Markdown files and intermediary TeX files.

There's also a TeX template for generating HTML [version](https://mmesek.github.io/resume/) of said resume.

# Usage

Fill in YAML files inside `meta/meta.yaml` and `configs/sections.yml` and run shell script to generate PDF.

```sh
./scripts/typst_pdf.sh "Your Name"
```
